title: After CPS workers attacked, union calls for special attention on safety
content: After two violent incidents last week involving Monroe County Child Protective Services workers, the union that represents them is calling on officials to take worker safety more seriously. In a statement, the Federation of Social Workers said the union "is deeply concerned about ongoing issues of safety that can place all workers in the field at risk of harm."
